ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: EER obtained financial support from the German Federal Ministry of Economic Cooperation and Development (Project: PARI). FE was funded through a grant from the German Research Foundation DFG (grant no. EW 119/5-1). SS acknowledges support from the German Federal Ministry of Education and Research (Project: GlobeDrought, grant no. 02WGR1457F).
